title: Is Unique
statement: Implement an algorithm to determine if a string has all unique characters.  What if you cannot use additional data structures?

hints.#1: Describe what it means for two strings to be permutations of each other. Now, look at that definition you provided. Can you check the strings against that definition?

hints.#84: There is one solution that is 0( N log N) time. Another solution uses some space, but isO(N) time.

hints.#122: Could a hash table be useful?

hints.#131: Two strings that are permutations should have the same characters, but in different orders. Can you make the orders the same?

examples.explanation: There are 6 pairs here. All the same.

constraints: Pairs should have elements with distinct indices

tests.explanation: There are 6 pairs here. All the same.
